title: Jon Klein & Collin Woodard
description:
Jonathok Klein and Collin Woodard are two successful automotive journalists who work full time in the space - what they share in common is both got their start writing for The Smoking Tire!

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/l7LGvvYF6nE

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @jonathan_klein 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @collinbwoodard @jonathan_klein

https://www.motortrend.com/staff/collin-woodard/
